job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: DescriptionbrpSEMCON provides a highly qualified professional and responsive technical and managerial workforce to satisfy customer requirements that support the Federal Aviation Administration FAAaposs mission vision goals SEMCONs company culture aligns enriching career experiences growth opportunities and collaborative engagement for all SEMCON employees resulting in a company value being greater than the sum of our partsbrbrppbrbrbrpp  brbrppstrongWant to be part of our teambrbrstrongppbrbrbrppWe are searching for a strongSoftware Engineerstrong to join our  NJ team in Egg Harbor Township supporting software design development maintenance testing and interface of software with computer hardware systems Experience in RedHatCentOS or similar Linux Operating Systems is requiredbrbrppbrbrbrppemThe Software Engineer will have the knowledge skills abilities andor Technical experience either professional or educational in all or some of the following areasbrbrempulliLanguages CC Java or similar objectoriented languageliliPlatforms  ActiveMQ  SOA JMSliliOperating Systems Windows LinuxliliSoftware Familiarity with modern repositories such as Subversion or Git and experience working with XMLliliAdaptability in a software environmentliliSQL or other databases is a plusliliVMWareCitrix virtual environments or equivalent is a plusliliExperience in FAANAS Systems is a plusliulpbrbrbrppDocumentation skills and excellent verbal and written communication skills are requiredbrbrppbrbrbrppBacheloraposs Degree in Engineering Math Computer Science or other related discipline and 35 years of experience and the ability to obtain a Security Clearance is required brbrppbrbrbrppThis position may require some travel approx 1015 brbrppbrbrbrppSEMCON offers a competitive salary and complete benefits package which includes health benefits medical dental vision and life 401K with a generous employer match  paid time off and paid holidays brbrppbrbrbrpbrbrRequirements
